alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Dunn; Eau Claire (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 10:35PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dunn, southwestern Chippewa and western Eau Claire Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1035 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Knapp to 10 miles northwest of Mondovi. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elk Mound, Eau Claire, Fall Creek, Lake Hallie and Altoona. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 32 and 80. U.S. Highway 53 between mile markers 86 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west central Wisconsin.
